hillburrow.slave-guard-2: Goddesses, it's so tiring watching people work all day long...
hillburrow.rainy-purple-talk-in-dorms: Don't talk to me here, it's not safe. Tonight, in the dorms.

save-drunken-master.inspect-drunken-master: You see an old pony, unconscious, lying and bleeding on an operation table. A piece of wood is sticking out of his belly.
